title: Matplotlib Logit Scale Plotting
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create plots with logit axes in Matplotlib. Logit axes are commonly used in probability plots to represent the cumulative distribution function (CDF) of a distribution. We will use the math, numpy, and matplotlib.pyplot libraries for this lab.

meta.title: Matplotlib Logit Axes | Data Visualization
meta.description: Learn how to create plots with logit axes in Matplotlib, a powerful data visualization library. Explore cumulative distribution functions (CDFs) of different distributions.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Logit Axes, Data Visualization, Probability Plots, Cumulative Distribution Function
